name: BambooGarden
0:
”Alexa open Bamboo Garden”
”Alexa ask Bamboo Garden to play for 8 hours”
”Alexa, pause”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: bamboo garden
des:
Find your zen with the gentle rustling of bamboo leaves and the occasional creaking of bamboo stalks swaying in the breeze. This skill brings the peaceful ambiance of a bamboo garden to your space, ideal for meditation, yoga, or unwinding after a long day.

1. On Alexa app, navigate to Routines.
2. Click + to add a new routine.
3. Click + for "When this happens" and choose one.
4. Click + for "Add action" and choose "Skills".
5. Choose "Your Skills" and select Bamboo Garden
6. Choose Device to perform the routine and save.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
